backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining types (UserProfile, ApiCredentials, BotConfig with Grid/MACD-RSI/EMA strategies, TradeRecord, OrderRequest) and functions for user profile management, API credentials, bot configuration, trading history, and manual order execution with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of three trading bots (Grid, MACD+RSI, EMA Scalping) and comprehensive dashboard with associated frontend files, components, test IDs, and high confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend TypeScript/TSX files covering routing, hooks, authentication, layout, pages, bot components, trading forms, and styling configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles with OKLCH color system defining CSS variables for light and dark themes optimized for trading interface with deep backgrounds and accent colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Bitunix Trading Bot application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, dashboard, manual trading, and settings pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider with Header, ProfileSetupModal, and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button component handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states, error handling for duplicate authentication, and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog forcing first-time users to create a profile with name (required) and email (optional) after Internet Identity authentication, preventing dismissal until completed.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Route wrapper component that redirects unauthenticated users to landing page and shows loading spinner during identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/bots/BotConfigDi: Dialog component with tabbed interface for configuring bot strategy (Grid/MACD-RSI/EMA) and risk management settings, rendering appropriate config form based on botType.
frontend/src/components/bots/BotModeTogg: A toggle switch component that allows users to switch a bot between automated and manual modes, updating the bot configuration via mutation and displaying toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/bots/EmaScalping: Configuration form for EMA scalping bot strategy with adjustable stop-loss and take-profit percentages using sliders, displaying strategy summary and risk/reward ratio.
frontend/src/components/bots/GridBotConf: Configuration form for grid trading bot with inputs for upper/lower price bounds, grid levels, and investment per grid, displaying calculated price steps and total investment.
frontend/src/components/bots/MacdRsiBotC: Configuration form for MACD+RSI bot strategy with timeframe selection, leverage slider, and position size input, showing effective leveraged position size.
frontend/src/components/bots/RiskManagem: Form component for configuring bot risk management parameters including stop-loss, take-profit percentages, maximum position size, and daily loss limits with sliders and inputs.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/BotCar: Card component displaying bot metrics including profit/loss, trade count, open positions, and latest signal, with settings button to open configuration dialog and mode toggle.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/RiskMe: Dashboard panel showing risk management overview with today's P/L, daily loss limit usage with progress bar, and open positions count calculated from trading history.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component displaying copyright information and a branded link to caffeine.ai with dynamic year and app identifier.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header component with navigation menu (Dashboard, Manual Trading, Settings) that displays when authenticated, shows user profile name, and includes a login button.
frontend/src/components/trading/ManualTr: Form component for placing manual spot or futures trades with configurable symbol, side (buy/sell or long/short), order type (market/limit), amount, price, and leverage settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApiCredentials.ts: Hook that wraps API credential queries (hasApiCredentials, saveApiCredentials, deleteApiCredentials) and returns their status and mutation functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useBotMetrics.ts: Hook that calculates bot performance metrics (profit/loss, trade count, open positions, latest signal) by combining bot configurations with trading history data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and auth client lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, bot configs, trading history, order placement, balance, and API credentials management.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hook that wraps user profile queries and mutations, providing simplified access to current user profile data and save functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark theme colors, including primary, secondary, chart colors, and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays bot metrics, risk metrics panel, and bot cards with refresh functionality. Shows loading state and handles empty bot configurations.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page with hero section showcasing three trading bot strategies (Grid, MACD+RSI, EMA Scalping) and feature cards. Redirects authenticated users to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/ManualTrading.tsx: Manual trading interface with tabs for spot and futures trading, displays account balance and recent manual trade history. Includes trade execution forms for both market types.
frontend/src/pages/Settings.tsx: Settings page for managing Bitunix API credentials with save, test connection, and delete functionality. Includes secure input fields with show/hide toggles and connection status feedback.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing. Includes sessionStorage persistence and parameter cleanup functions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended animations, and design tokens for UI components. Includes typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file defining a trading bot application for Bitunix exchange with three bots (spot grid, MACD/RSI futures, EMA scalping futures) and features including dashboard, manual/automated trading modes, and Internet Identity authentication. Contains architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and image requirements for the UI.
